name: boblocale2.0
title: Bob's Locale Translations for 2.0
author: Karosieben, Bobingabout

description: Adds translations for Bob's mods and other supporting mods for Bob's from the Community. Contribute on crowdin! NOTE: This is a port for 2.0 with updated translations and will be retired if Karosieben updates the original mod.
